trans-unit.source: Represents a security token provider that provides <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"></xref> security tokens for a SOAP message sender.
trans-unit.target: Representa um fornecedor de tokens de segurança que fornece <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"> </xref> tokens de segurança para um SOAP remetente da mensagem.

trans-unit.source: In most instances it is not necessary to call the X509SecurityTokenProvider class directly, as it is called when a client sends a SOAP message that requires a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria das instâncias não é necessário chamar a classe de X509SecurityTokenProvider diretamente, como se chama quando um cliente envia uma mensagem SOAP requer um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>token de segurança.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Specifically, a client specifies the type of security token required, using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method to get a security token.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, o cliente especifica o tipo de token de segurança necessário, utilizando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>classe e o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>classe chamadas a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>método para obter um token de segurança.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>

trans-unit.source: When the security token required is an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando o token de segurança necessário é uma <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>token de segurança, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>chamadas de método de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider"></xref> class using the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider"> </xref> classe utilizando o certificado x.&509; especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> method gets a security token based on the certificate specified in the `certificate` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>método obtém uma segurança token com base em certificado especificado no `certificate` parâmetro.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> to get a security token for.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> para obter token para um tipo de segurança.

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider"></xref> class by getting an X.509 certificate from the specified certificate store criteria.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider"> </xref> critérios de armazenar classe por obter um certificado x.&509; do certificado especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> method gets a security token based on the certificate that matches the specified certificate store criteria.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>obtém método um token de segurança com base no certificado que corresponda o certificado especificado armazenar critérios.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation"></xref> values that specifies the certificate store location.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation"> </xref> localização do arquivo de valores que especifica o certificado.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName"></xref> values that specifies the certificate store name.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName"> </xref> valores que especifica o certificado armazenam o nome.

trans-unit.source: One of the<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType"></xref> values that specifies how to search the certificate store.
trans-unit.target: Um do<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType"> </xref> valores que especifica como procurar o arquivo de certificados.

trans-unit.source: The value used to find the X.509 certificate in the certificate store.
trans-unit.target: O valor utilizado para localizar o certificado x.&509; no arquivo de certificados.

trans-unit.source: findValue is .
trans-unit.target: findValueis .

trans-unit.source: No certificates match the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: Não existem certificados correspondem aos critérios especificados.

trans-unit.source: -or- More than one certificate matches the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: - ou - mais do que um certificado corresponde aos critérios especificados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate associated with the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"></xref> security token.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o certificado x.&509; associado a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"> </xref> token de segurança.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> method gets a security token based on the certificate represented by the Certificate property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>método obtém uma segurança token com base no certificado representado pela propriedade de certificado.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> that represents the X.509 certificate of a security token.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> que representa o certificado x.&509; de um token de segurança.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a security token using the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um token de segurança utilizando o certificado x.&509; especificado no construtor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class when a client sends a SOAP message and an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token is required.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>método é denominado pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>classe quando um cliente envia uma mensagem SOAP e o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>token de segurança não é necessário.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method calls the GetTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>método chama o método de GetTokenCore.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that gets the security token.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.TimeSpan>que especifica o valor de tempo limite para a mensagem que obtém o token de segurança.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token to get.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> que representa o token de segurança a obter.
